params._dex: ID for choosing the DEX where prices will be retrieved (0 = Uniswap v2, 1 = Sushiswap)
params._path: path of tokens to reach a _tokenAddress from a USD stablecoin (e.g: [ USDC, WETH, VSP ])
params._tokenAddress: address of the ERC20 token to add support to

createStream(address,uint256,address,add.details: Payer (_msgSender()) is set as admin of "pausableRole", so he can grant and revoke the "pausable" role later on

params._endTime: timestamp that sets drip distribution end
params._fundingAddress: address used to withdraw the drip
params._payee: address that receives the payment stream
params._token: address of the ERC20 token that payee receives as payment
params._usdAmount: uint256 total amount in USD (scaled to 18 decimals) to be distributed until endTime

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateSwapManager(address).details: Only contract owner can change swapManager

params._newAddress: address of new Swap Manager instance

addToken(address,uint8,address[]).notice: If caller is contract owner it adds (or updates) Oracle price feed for given token

getStream(uint256).notice: Returns address of the stream located at given id

getStreamsCount().notice: Returns no. of streams stored in contract

ours(address).notice: Checks if a address belongs to this contract' streams

updateOracles(address).notice: Updates price oracles for a given token

usdToTokenAmount(address,uint256).notice: Converts given amount in usd to target token amount using oracle
